'''Beta 1.19.50.25''' (Android) or '''Preview 1.19.50.25''' (Windows, iOS, iPadOS, Xbox) is the sixth and final beta/''Preview'' version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.19.50]], released on November 16, 2022,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/10672880007565|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.19.50.25|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=November 16, 2022}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''Touch'''
* The new touch controls are now enabled by default.

== Fixes ==
'''Gameplay'''
* Reverted change to player being pushed while stuck inside a block to iron out some issues with pistons. ({{bug|MCPE-136536}})

'''Touch'''
* Removed the trivial joystick when the player is on the raft in the classic control mode. ({{bug|MCPE-163758}})

'''User Interface'''
* Fixed frame rate dropping when hovering over item slots on the Creative inventory screen. ({{bug|MCPE-162277}})
* Recipes relying on wood slabs (eg. composter and lectern) are now previewed properly on the crafting table screen.
